# Blindness/Deafness (Spell)
## Overview
[[Necromancy Spells|Necromancy]] \[[[Curse Spells|curse]]]

**Level:** [[2nd Level Bard Spells|Bard 2]], [[3rd Level Cleric Spells|Cleric 3]], [[Corruption (Domain)|Corruption 2]], [[2nd Level Sorcerer Spells|Sorcerer 2]], [[2nd Level Wizard Spells|Wizard 2]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 6th-Level Cleric Spells List|Cleric 6]], [[BoXM 3rd-Level Wizard Spells List|Wizard 3]]

**Casting Time:** 1 standard action

**Components:** V

**Range:** Medium (100 ft. + 10 ft./level)

**Target:** One living creature

**Duration:** Permanent (D)

**Saving Throw:** Fortitude negates

**Spell Resistance:** Yes

**Source:** PF Core Rulebook, pg. 250

You call upon the powers of unlife to render the subject [[Blinded|blinded]] or [[Deafened|deafened]], as you choose.

**GM Note**

*House Rule:* Added curse descriptor per *Ultimate Magic*.

                       Added Corruption 2 to Level per *Fiendish Codex I.*
